title: If you had to date a Champion for one day, who would it be and why?
body:
Don't act as if this is a weird question to ask, because lets be honest...

The only people who actually visit the forums daily are the weird ones. Be proud. Be different.

'Murica.

*Shrugs*, less weird than some people, there's a certain range where weird is good. and this is within that point. but there are those certain points where it just goes over the top... *Cough necrophilia* and stuff like that. thats just creepy.

I think that I have to agree with you on that tomboy statement. There is just something I find interesting about tomboys. Unfortunately, this interest is coming only from anime that I've seen, since I've never actually met a tomboy in person. Part of me kind of wishes that I will meet one though.

Unfortunately, this interest is coming only from anime that I've seen, since I've never actually met a tomboy in person. Part of me kind of wishes that I will meet one though.

In all honesty, I don't qualify that as a "tomboy".  I don't know.  Like I said, all "knowledge" I have when it comes to tomboys is only what I got from watching anime.  And that ISN'T exactly the best source.

He then proceeds to shoot just about everyone with said laser.
